attributes.action: Put champions league and Europa league back on terrestrial tv
attributes.background: The British public are being denied the right to see European football.

rejection.details:
If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make these "listed events" that must be offered to free-to-air channels, you could start a new petition calling for that. 

You can find out more about the law here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN00802
